display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index : (Apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with no oxygen desaturation used and with or without arousal) / hour of sleep from type I polysomnography
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60*(hrembp + hrop + hnrbp + hnrop + carbp + carop + canbp + canop + oarbp + oarop + oanbp + oanop + marbp + marop + manrbp + manrop) / slpprdp
